title: Drawing, "Pineapple Juice, Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache on paper, lined.
inscribed:
In graphite, lower center: PINEAPPLE JUICE
In graphite, lower right : Tommi Parzinger. 320 East 57th Street. NYC.
description: On red background, a pattern of pineapple motifs in white and coral with red cross-hatch marks and blue and red tops.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Pineapple Juice, Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-50.
